# Telegram Mini Apps Developer Guide

> Build web apps inside Telegram with TON blockchain integration.
> Feed this file to Claude Code, Cursor, or ChatGPT to build TMAs.
> Version: 1.1 | Updated: January 2026
> Source: https://github.com/ohld/tma-llms-txt

## Agent Instructions
- [How to use this guide](llms-full.txt) — decision tree, scaffold steps, common LLM mistakes (Section 0)

## Getting Started
- [What is a TMA](https://core.telegram.org/bots/webapps) — architecture, lifecycle, WebView constraints
- [BotFather Setup](llms-full.txt) — create bot, enable Mini App, set URL (Section 2)
- [Local Development](llms-full.txt) — ngrok HTTPS tunnel with free static domain (Section 2)
- [Hello World](llms-full.txt) — minimal HTML + telegram-web-app.js + ready() (Section 2)
- [Community Docs](https://docs.telegram-mini-apps.com/platform/about) — comprehensive TMA platform guide

## Frontend
- [@tma.js/sdk](https://docs.telegram-mini-apps.com/packages/tma-js-sdk) — TypeScript SDK v3, signals, React/Vue
- [@tma.js/sdk-react](https://docs.telegram-mini-apps.com/packages/tma-js-sdk-react) — React hooks and bindings
- [Migration from @telegram-apps](https://docs.telegram-mini-apps.com/packages/tma-js-sdk/migrate-from-telegram-apps) — SDK rename guide
- [Official WebApp Script](https://core.telegram.org/bots/webapps#initializing-mini-apps) — telegram-web-app.js (vanilla)
- [MainButton, BackButton, Popups](llms-full.txt) — UI components reference (Section 3)
- [Theming](llms-full.txt) — CSS variables var(--tg-theme-*), dark mode (Section 3)
- [Storage](llms-full.txt) — CloudStorage, DeviceStorage, SecureStorage (Section 3)
- [Methods Reference](https://docs.telegram-mini-apps.com/platform/methods) — 70+ available methods
- [Events Reference](https://docs.telegram-mini-apps.com/platform/events) — 35+ events

## Authentication
- [Init Data](https://docs.telegram-mini-apps.com/platform/init-data) — what initData is, fields, user object
- [HMAC-SHA256 Validation](llms-full.txt) — algorithm + Node.js + Python code (Section 4)
- [@telegram-apps/init-data-node](https://www.npmjs.com/package/@telegram-apps/init-data-node) — Node.js server-side validation
- [Authorizing User](https://docs.telegram-mini-apps.com/platform/authorizing-user) — auth patterns guide
- [Express Middleware](llms-full.txt) — Node.js auth middleware pattern (Section 4)
- [FastAPI Middleware](llms-full.txt) — Python auth middleware with APIKeyHeader (Section 4)

## TON Connect
- [TON Connect Overview](https://docs.ton.org/ecosystem/ton-connect/overview) — protocol overview
- [React SDK](https://docs.ton.org/v3/guidelines/ton-connect/frameworks/react) — @tonconnect/ui-react setup
- [Creating Manifest](https://docs.ton.org/v3/guidelines/ton-connect/creating-manifest) — tonconnect-manifest.json
- [TON Transfer](llms-full.txt) — send TON with toNano() + comments (Section 5)
- [Jetton Transfer](https://docs.ton.org/v3/guidelines/ton-connect/cookbook/jetton-transfer) — USDT/token transfer
- [Preparing Messages](https://docs.ton.org/v3/guidelines/ton-connect/guidelines/preparing-messages) — transaction message format
- [TONAPI](https://docs.tonconsole.com/tonapi/rest-api) — balances, prices, transaction history
- [Demo dApp](https://github.com/ton-connect/demo-dapp-with-wallet) — reference React implementation
- [USDT Payments Demo](https://github.com/ton-community/tma-usdt-payments-demo) — jetton payments example

## Backend
- [grammY](https://grammy.dev/) — TypeScript bot framework (recommended)
- [aiogram 3](https://docs.aiogram.dev/) — Python bot framework
- [Telegram Bot API](https://core.telegram.org/bots/api) — official bot API reference
- [Webhook + API Server](llms-full.txt) — Express + grammY on same server (Section 6)
- [FastAPI + aiogram](llms-full.txt) — Python full-stack setup (Section 6)
- [Database Patterns](llms-full.txt) — PostgreSQL, user table, upsert (Section 6)
- [Telegram Stars](https://core.telegram.org/bots/payments-stars) — fiat payments for digital goods
- [Webhooks Guide](https://core.telegram.org/bots/webhooks) — setup and requirements

## Deployment
- [Docker Compose](llms-full.txt) — nginx + backend + postgres + redis (Section 7)
- [Pre-Launch Checklist](llms-full.txt) — what to verify before going live (Section 7)
- [Blockchain Guidelines](https://core.telegram.org/bots/blockchain-guidelines) — Telegram crypto rules

## Testing & Debugging
- [Debugging Guide](https://docs.telegram-mini-apps.com/platform/debugging) — Chrome/Safari/Eruda setup
- [Test Environment](https://core.telegram.org/bots/webapps#using-bots-in-the-test-environment) — Telegram test mode
- [Mock Environment](llms-full.txt) — mockTelegramEnv + retrieveLaunchParams pattern for browser testing (Section 8)
- [Test User](llms-full.txt) — id=0 pattern for automated testing (Section 8)

## Best Practices
- [Production Patterns](llms-full.txt) — lazy SDK loading, auth expiry, share fallbacks (Section 9)
- [Common LLM Mistakes](llms-full.txt) — top 11 mistakes AI agents make (Section 0)

## GitHub & npm
- [TMA GitHub Org](https://github.com/telegram-mini-apps) — official repositories
- [TON Connect SDK](https://github.com/ton-connect/sdk) — TON Connect protocol
- [@tma.js/sdk on npm](https://www.npmjs.com/package/@tma.js/sdk) — TMA SDK
- [@tonconnect/ui-react on npm](https://www.npmjs.com/package/@tonconnect/ui-react) — TON Connect React
- [grammy on npm](https://www.npmjs.com/package/grammy) — grammY bot framework
- [TMA Step-by-Step](https://docs.ton.org/v3/guidelines/dapps/tma/tutorials/step-by-step-guide) — TON Foundation tutorial
